description:
The hot springs battle is boiling over and things start getting really bombastic when Panda’s bread explodes… three times! How can this possibly be? Has Mokoyama made the bread he’s always dreamed of making?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Mushi Pan!! Panda ga Panda ni Natta Hi!
The Miraculous Steamed Bread!! The Day Panda Turned Into a Panda!
Un pain vapeur prodigieux ! Panda devient un vrai panda !
ขนมปังนึ่งปาฏิหารย์!! วันที่แพนด้ากลายเป็นแพนด้า
奇跡の蒸しパン!! パンダがパンダになった日!
